title: Only Volcanic water ceremony (Detox)
description: The medicinal water comes from volcanoes that means it comes from Mother Earth - Pachamama. She gives us this healing water to help cleanse our body condition. #detox
cleaned_text: Note - Private retreats are also available, which offer more flexibility in the itinerary. Private retreats can be reserved depending on booking availability, and at an additional rate. - Any patient can have a extra massage or yoga class for a price per session.
